update sys_order
orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
openId = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memberId = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysMerchantId = #{sysMerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysMerchantSerialNo = #{sysMerchantSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agentId = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agentSerialNo = #{agentSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgId = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgName = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdAt = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatedAt = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trueName = #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productList = #{productList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productPrice = #{productPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mailPrice = #{mailPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
couponPrice = #{couponPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
totalPrice = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
groupon = #{groupon,jdbcType=BIT},
groupcode = #{groupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
houseAddress = #{houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
payMode = #{payMode,jdbcType=TINYINT},

score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},

info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopId = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sourceType = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchantType = #{merchantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_order set orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openId = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memberId = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysMerchantId = #{sysMerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysMerchantSerialNo = #{sysMerchantSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agentId = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agentSerialNo = #{agentSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgId = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgName = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdAt = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedAt = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trueName = #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productList = #{productList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productPrice = #{productPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mailPrice = #{mailPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, couponPrice = #{couponPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, totalPrice = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, groupon = #{groupon,jdbcType=BIT}, groupcode = #{groupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, houseAddress = #{houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payMode = #{payMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, payType = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, payStatus = #{payStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, printStatus = #{printStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, handleStatus = #{handleStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopId = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sourceType = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} merchantType = #{ merchantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select order1.id, order1.agentSerialNo,
merc.merchantType, merc.merchantName from sys_order order1 ,sys_merchant merc where order1.sysMerchantId = merc.id
and (orderId like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or sysMerchantSerialNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or agentSerialNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
ORDER BY id
limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from sys_order where 1 = 1
and (orderId like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or sysMerchantSerialNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or agentSerialNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
